description: JSON file to be used to parse KMS documentation
name: Display and KMS Tests for Intel i915 and Xe Drivers

_properties_.description: Contains the major group for the tested functionality 'Display'
Contains the mega feature for end to end use case, e.g. the 'PSR' feature.
Groups tests on buckets containg more detailed functionality
Defines what category of testlist it belongs
Defines the test category. Usually used at subtest level.
Provides a description for the test/subtest.
